edit_snmpuser.auth_password_error: Specify a password that contains 8 to 31 alphanumeric characters including - and _

remove_snmpuser.remove_error: user1 cannot be removed while it is being used by one or more trap destinations.
remove_snmpuser.resolution: Remove the associated trap destinations first and try again. Alternatively, edit the trap destinations to specify a different user and try again.

SNMPtraps.error_msg: Cannot add more than the maximum of 6 SNMPV3 trap destinations. Please remove a SNMPv3 trap destination before creating a new one.

add_snmpv3_trapdestination.trap_error: The SNMPv3 trap destination or inform could not be added. The maximum supported number of SNMPv3 trap destinations or informs is 6.
add_snmpv3_trapdestination.resolution: Resolution: Remove one of the SNMPv3 trap destinations or informs to add the new SNMPv3 trap destination or inform. Alternatively, if supported, specify the format as SNMPv1 or SNMPv2 and try again.

add_snmpv3_trapdestination.trap_error: The SNMPv3 trap destination or inform could not be added. The maximum supported number of SNMPv3 trap destinations or informs is 6.
add_snmpv3_trapdestination.resolution: Resolution: Remove one of the SNMPv3 trap destinations or informs to add the new SNMPv3 trap destination or inform. Alternatively, if supported, specify the format as SNMPv1 or SNMPv2 and try again.

add_snmpv3_trapdestination.port_error: Provide a port number between 1 and 65535.

add_snmpv3_trapdestination.engineid_error: The engine ID must be prefixed with '0x' followed by an even number of 10 to 64 hexadecimal digits.

adduser.invalid_username_error: Specify a username that contains 1 to 31 alphanumeric characters

adduser.auth_password_error: Specify a password that contains 8 to 31 alphanumeric characters including - and _

adduser.privacy_password_error: Specify a password that contains 8 to 31 alphanumeric characters including - and _

adduser.auth_password_error: Specify a password that contains 8 to 31 alphanumeric characters including - and _
